weapon_awakened.name: Kusanagi Sword
weapon_awakened.description: Strikes a Column, burning them and reducing their Rage by 300.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Impacta a una columna quemando los enemigos y reduciendoles la ira (rage) por 300.
weapon_awakened.description_pt: Atinge uma coluna de inimigos, causando queimadura e reduzindo 300 de rage.

weapon_awakened.description: 40% chance to paralyze the enemy.
weapon_awakened.description_es: 40% de chance de paralizar a un enemigo.
weapon_awakened.description_pt: 40% de chance de causar paralisia ao inimigo. Reduz o ATK das Fighters femininas inimigas em 15%.

weapon_awakened.name: Wolves' Anger
weapon_awakened.description: Reduces the target's 15% DEF with 36% chance to stun the target and 50% chance to reduce all enemies' ATK.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Reduce la defensa de los objetivos en 15%, con un 36% de chance de Stun y un 50% de chance de reducir el ataque a todos los enemigos
weapon_awakened.description_pt: Reduz o DEF de 15% do alvo com 36% de chance de causar atordoamento e 50% de chance de reduzir o ATK de todos os inimigos.

weapon_awakened.name: Sharpened Saber
weapon_awakened.description: Strikes the rear enemy with the least HP remaining, and heals allies' Fighter with the least HP remaining.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Golpea en la línea trasera de los enemigos contra el que tenga menor puntos de Vida restantes (HP), y cura a un aliado con la menor cantidad de Puntos de Vida (HP) restantes.
weapon_awakened.description_pt: Golpeia o inimigo da retaguarda que tiver menos HP restantes e cura o aliado com menos HP restantes.

weapon_awakened.name: HUD Sunglasses
weapon_awakened.description: Ignite the napalm to strike the enemy's rear with increasing 20% DMG and 16% chance to stun them. Extra 70% DMG against GANK Fighters.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Golpea la línea enemiga trasera con un incremento de 20% de daño (DMG) y un 16% de probabilidad de aturdirlos. Causa 70% de daño extra contra luchadores tipo GANK.
weapon_awakened.description_pt: Ataca a retaguarda do inimigo com 20% de DMG e 16% de chance de causar atordoamento. Causa 70% de DMG Extra contra Fighters GANK.

weapon_awakened.name: Flashing Crystal Orb
weapon_awakened.description: Athena uses swimsuit to surround herself with a Superpower Ball healing all your Fighters.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Athena usa un traje de baño para rodearse a sí misma con una "Superpower Ball", curando a todos los aliados
weapon_awakened.description_pt: Athena usa um traje de banho para cercar a si mesma com uma “Superpower Ball”, curando todos os aliados

weapon_awakened.description: After Yata no Kagami, the exclusive weapon awakened, Path of the Void improves a lot. Strikes all enemies with 32% chance to silence each of them.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Después de Yata no Kagami, el arma exclusiva despertada, Path of the Void mejora mucho. Golpea a todos los enemigos con un 32% de probabilidad de silenciar a cada uno de ellos.

weapon_awakened.name: Flower Butterfly Fan
weapon_awakened.description: Strikes all enemies with burning, also restores 100 Rage for the rear allies' Fighters.
Twist in air to attack enemies' crucial point to reduce a row targets' 15% Anti-Crit and 80% Heal rate for 2 rounds with 80% more DMG to enemies' Orochi Chris.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Gira en el aire para atacar el punto crucial de los enemigos reduciendo en 15% Anti-Crit de una fila de objetivos 80% de Heal Rate y 80% más de daño (DMG) a Orochi Chris.
weapon_awakened.description_pt: Dá um rodopio no ar para atacar o ponto crucial dos inimigos para reduzir, em uma coluna, 15% de Anti-Crit e 80% do Heal Rate por 2 rodadas, com 80% a mais de DMG contra o Orochi Chris.

weapon_awakened.name: Bloodlust Dagger
weapon_awakened.description: After his exclusive weapon Bloodlust Dagger awakened, Yamazaki is going to be furios. His DMG dealt increases with extra 30% DMG for DPS enemies and the Unyielding effect increases most 40% DMG.
After her exclusive weapon awakened, M. Spash Rose improves a lot with increasing 50% DEF and 25% Res Rate and 15% more chance to stun enemies.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Después de que despertó su arma exclusiva, M. Spash Rose mejora mucho al aumentar el 50% de DEF y el 25% de Res Rate y un 15% más de probabilidad de aturdir a los enemigos.

weapon_awakened.description: Maiden Masher is able to rip the target's body and spirit apart, causing DMG and stealing 15% ATK and 30% DEF from the target.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Maiden Masher es capaz de desgarrar el cuerpo y el espíritu del enimigo, causando DMG y robando 15% de ATK y 30% de DEF.
weapon_awakened.description_pt: "Maiden Masher" é capaz de rasgar o corpo e o espírito do alvo, causando DMG e roubando 15% de ATK e 30% de DEF.

weapon_awakened.description: After exclusive weapon awakened, strikes a single enemy to reduce target 30% DEF and 15% Res Rate (2 rounds). If ally Fighter number is less than the enemies'. increase own 40% Crit in this round.

After awakening exclusive weapon, attacks all enemies, lowering their chance to cast skill by 10% (2 rounds) . If your side has all 4 Fightsouls, Tiger, Snake , Bear , Turtle , additional 15% chance to stun.

After the awakening weapon, deals huge damage in a column, enhancing own block rate by 30% (2 rounds), and dealing 60% extra DMG to DPS enemies. If the total number of DPS fighters (including both sides) is equal to or greater than 5, will increase own Res-rate by additional 20% (2 rounds).
Strikes a single enemy with 15% DEF and 15% Res Rate reduction. 40% chance to transform into Billy or Crazy Iori to cast the ULT.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Ataca a un enemigo reduciendole 15% de DEF y 15% de Res Rate, tiene 40% de chance de lanzar el ULT de Billy o Crazy Iori.
weapon_awakened.description_pt: Ninjutsu de Eiji, ataca um único inimigo reduzindo em 15% DEF e em 15% Res Rate do alvo, com 40% de probabilidade de se transformar em Billy ou Iori para lançar a ULT.

weapon_awakened.name: Aikido Bracelet
weapon_awakened.description: After exclusive weapon awakened, will cause damage to all enemies, and randomly reduce 2 enemies 200 Rage; while increase own rage recovery speed by 50%.

weapon_awakened.name: MECH. EYE II
weapon_awakened.description: Strikes a random rear enemy, while giving self additional 40% HP drain, 30% chance to resurrect with 50% of Rage at point of death. Increases 100% DMG and HP drain.
Uses hurricane to clear allies' debuff and strike the front enemy with reducing 200 Rage for each target and drain 70% to himself. Extra 80% DMG against GANK Fighters.

weapon_awakened.name: Extreme K' Glove
weapon_awakened.description: Release glove limit to strikes a column with increasing allies' rear 20% Crit and 30% Crit. Reduce Main target's 30% DEF. The fewer both sides Fighters, the higher DMG.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Libera el límite del guante para golpear a una columna ,incrementando en un 20% Crit los aliados traseros y un 30% Crit el mismo. Reduce el 30% de DEF del objetivo principal. Mientras menos luchadores de ambos lados, mayor DMG.

weapon_awakened.name: Bloody Whip
weapon_awakened.description: Whip will concentrate the power in her desert eagle pistol, shooting a fatal bullet at the enemy with the highest DMG, reducing their DMG by <font color='#FFA726'>35%</font> and Def by <font color='#FFA726'>35%</font> defense. If whip has been deployed for more than 3 rounds, she will begin targeting the enemies with the lowest HP, and with an additional <font color='#FFA726'>20%</font> crit rate.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Whip concetra su poder en su pistola, disparando una bala fatal hacia el enemigo con el daño mas alto, reduciendo el daño de este en <font color='#FFA726'>35%</font> y su DEF en <font color='#FFA726'>35%</font>. Si Whip esta en el campo mas de 3 rounds (4 o mas), ella comenzara a hacer objetivos a los enemigos con el HP mas bajo y gana un <font color='#FFA726'>20%</font> de Crit Rate.

weapon_awakened.description: Uses ice field to strike enemies. The fewer the enemy Fighters, the more the DMG (100% max). Randomly decrease 4 enemies' 70% Crit Power with 40% chance to freeze 2 of them.

weapon_awakened.name: 50cc Motorcycle
weapon_awakened.description: This attack get +35% Crit and +30% Crit Power; if current battle is more than 3 rounds. this attack will get +50% Crit and +60% Crit Power.

weapon_awakened.name: Imitation Life Chain
weapon_awakened.description: Attack a column of enemies, reducing target ATK by <font color='#FFA726'>10%</font> and reducing damage rate (3 rounds, Igniz and Gesse in god mode is immune). Affected targets will receive <font color='#FFA726'>35%</font> additional DMG, also increase allies <font color='#FFA726'>30%</font> control-free, if Igniz has been deployed for more than 3 rounds, reduce ATK and increase DMG received buff can expand to all enemies.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Ataca una columna, Reduciendoles el ATK en <font color='#FFA726'>10%</font> y el DMG Rate por 3 Rounds (Igniz y Geese en God mode son inmunes). Los Objetivos afectados por el ULT recibiran <font color='#FFA726'>35%</font> de daño adicional y los aliados ganan <font color='#FFA726'>30%</font> de Control-Free, Si Igniz esta en el campo por mas de 3 rounds (4 o mas), no solo los objetivos golpeados sufriran los efectos del ULT sino todos los enemigos.

weapon_awakened.description: Strikes a row enemies to absorb their DEF for 1 round(65% in total, average to each target). If he lives for more than 3 rounds, it will increase own 40% ATK and little Rage restore speed (2 rounds).

weapon_awakened.name: Peerless Knuckles
weapon_awakened.description: Strikes all enemies and grants Avatar effect (Restores 20% HP, 90% chance to control-free, 20% DEF and 20% Res Rate increase, increase next round's skill chance to 100%). If the enemy has only 1 Fighter, it will grant him 3 times DMG.
weapon_awakened.description_pt: Atinge todos os inimigos e concede para si efeito Avatar (Restaura 20% de HP, 90% de chance de aumentar o controle, 20% de DEF e 20% de Taxa de Res, aumenta a chance de Skill da próxima rodada para 100%). Se o inimigo tiver apenas 1 Lutador, Geese causará 3 vezes mais de DMG.

weapon_awakened.description: Strikes a row and clear own debuff. Add "Duel" flag to the fighter who was hit. (If the enemy who has flag attacks but not against Krauser, the enemy will lose 5% current HP and get no Rage. If the enemy attacks Krauser or Krauser is dead, the flag will disappear.) The "Duel" is permanent.
After awakening weapon, 40% probability chance to paralyze taarget (decreasse target 40% Anti-Crit Res and 40% Block); and the high voltage can penetrate the target, causing 50% damage.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Después de despertar del arma, 40% de probabilidad de paralizar al objetivo (disminuye el 40% de Anti-Crit del objetivo  y 40% Bloqueo); y la alta tensión puede penetrar en el objetivo, causando un 50% de daño.

weapon_awakened.name: Imitation Life Fighting Gloves
weapon_awakened.description: Attack a column, and hit the target of adding split effect, deal <font color='#FFA726'>35%</font> additional damage to targets with split or bleeding effect, if the front target not block (by Skill or normal block) and there is more than 1 enemy, then hit the target will be knocked away (will not return this round, does not work against petrified or frozen targets); enhaced front allies <font color='#FFA726'>25%</font> block.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Ataca una columna, los objetivo golpeados sufriran SPLIT, <font color='#FFA726'>35%</font> de daño extra a enemigos con efecto Split o Sangrado, Si el objetivo frontal no bloquea el ULT (ya sea por Skill Block o Normal Block) y hay mas de un enemigo en el campo, entonces Nameless lo manda a volar por los aires, lo expulsa del campo durante este turno y regresa en el turno del oponente (no funciona si el objetivo esta petrificado o congelado); Otorga a tu fila delantera <font color='#FFA726'>25%</font> de Blockeo.

weapon_awakened.name: Eternal Flame Soul
weapon_awakened.description: Attack a column of enemies and debuff enemies, also add "Flame" effect, or refresh them to last 3 rounds; the more enemies affected by "Flame" effect, the higher the ULT DMG (max<font color='#FFA726'> 30%</font> increase); if there is only 1 enemy in the column, will deal additional <font color='#FFA726'>30%</font> DMG.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Ataca una columna de enemigos y les aplicada debuff, también agrega el efecto "Flame", o los feresca hasta 3 rondas; Cuantos más enemigos se vean afectados por el efecto "Flame", mayor será el ULT DMG (máx. <font color='#FFA726'>30%</font> de aumento); Si solo hay 1 enemigo en la columna, hara un <font color='#FFA726'>30%</font> de DMG adicional.

weapon_awakened.description: Attack a column, increase own 30% ATK and DEF for 2 rounds; teammate with lowest HP percentage gets the shield (shield with 25% Elisabeth's max HP; when the shield is active, it does not take DMG reflection; and when the shield is broken, the teammate will not take splash DMG. This lasts for 2 rounds. If self is the one with lowest HP percentage, add to a random teammate); fist 2 ULT in each battle can add the shield, while the 3rd or later ones recover 15% own max HP; 35% chance to taunt target column (fighter confused by Magaki will no be taunted by Elisabeth), attack Elisabeth.
weapon_awakened.description_pt: Ataque uma coluna, aumente seu próprio ATK e DEF em 30% por 2 rodadas; o aliado com menor porcentagem de HP recebe o escudo (escudo com HP máximo de 25% de Elisabeth; quando o escudo está ativo, não recebe Dano por Reflexão; e quando o escudo é quebrado, o companheiro de equipe não recebe o dano de estouro "Splash DMG" (isso até a batalha terminar). Isso dura 2 rodadas. Se Elisabeth é quem possui a menor porcentagem de HP, concede a um aliado aleatório); os primeiros 2 ULT em cada batalha concede o escudo, enquanto do terceiro em diante recupera 15% do HP máximo; 35% de chance de provocar a coluna alvo, o fazendo atacar somente a Elisabeth (o lutador confuso por Magaki não será provocado por Elisabeth).

weapon_awakened.name: Dry Rock Bracelet
weapon_awakened.description: Attack all enemies, 30% chance to randomly petrify <font color='#FFA726'>3</font> enemies (petrified targets cannot block or skill block, use rage, decrease 15% Res Rate, and effect cannot be dispelled). The more enemies, the higher chance to petrify max 50%, the fewer enemies, the higher DMG. After reincarnation , will deal <font color='#FFA726'>50%</font> extra DMG to petrified targets.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Ataca a todos los enemigos, 30% de chance de petrificar a <font color='#FFA726'>3</font> aleatoriamente (los enemigos petrificados no pueden bloquear, usar Rage, -15% de Res Rate). Entre mas enemigos hay, mayor chance de petrificar (max 50%), Entre menos enemigos, mayor sera el daño. Despues de reencarnar, hace<font color='#FFA726'>50%</font> de DMG extra a enemigos petrificados.

weapon_awakened.description: Attack 3 random enemies, increase own <font color='#FFA726'>30%</font> DMG and Res Rate, 50% chance to confuse target (confused target cannot Use ULT or Skill, Can only attack Magaki, Magaki will copy it's attackers buff and <font color='#FFA726'>absorbing 10% current HP</font> after receiving attack); if the target is not confused after beign attacked, will deal 3x additional DMG based on Magaki DEF; the fewer total fighters remaining the higher the DMG, max 100%.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Ataca a tres objetivos aleatorios, aumente su propio ATK del 30% y la  res rate, 50% de probabilidad de confundir el objetivo (el objetivo confundido no puede liberar small skill o ULT, forzado a atacar a Magaki; Magaki, después del ataque inicial en este caso, copia el buff del atacante y absorbe el 10% de su salud actual); si el objetivo es alcanzado sin confundirse, infligirá DAÑO extra igual a 3 veces de Magaki Def; cuantos menos enemigos queden, mayor será el DAÑO, máximo aumento del 100%

weapon_awakened.name: Power of Nether Fire
weapon_awakened.description: After awakening, attack enemy DPS fighter with highest power first( if no DPS enemy fighter, attack enemy fighter with highest power); for each nether soul layer, increase 15% DMG, wich cannot be blocked or resisted; absorb target's <font color='#FFA726'>12%</font>  max HP, clear target’s buff effects, <font color='#FFA726'>clear own debuff</font>, and add nether fire effects; if all nether soul layers are used up, switch to ULT Kyoryuu-no-Ori, get 1 nether soul layer seize target's buff status, and pass own debuff to enemy;
weapon_awakened.description_es: Después del despertar del arma, ataca primero al DPS enemigo con el poder más alto (si no hay luchador enemigo DPS, ataca al enemigo con el poder más alto); por cada capa inferior del alma, aumente el 15% de DMG, que no se puede bloquear ni resistir; absorbe el <font color = '# FFA726'> 12% </font> HP máximo del objetivo, elimina los efectos de mejora del objetivo(buffs), <font color = '# FFA726'> elimina el debuff propio </font> y agrega efectos de fuego inferior; si todas las capas inferiores del alma están agotadas, cambia a Kyoryuu-no-Ori ULT, obtiene 1 capa inferior del alma, toma el buff del objetivo y pasa su propio debuff al enemigo.

weapon_awakened.name: Bernstein
weapon_awakened.description: Increase own 30% Crit Rate, attack 2 random enemies, target will lose 300 Rage if not killed; increasing all allies 10% ULT Res for 1 round, for every bear soul fighter in your team, effect increased by 5%, max 30%
weapon_awakened.description_pt: Aumente sua própria taxa de crítico em de 30%; Ataca 2 inimigos aleatórios, o alvo perderá 300 de Rage se não for morto; Aumento de todos os aliados em 10% de resistência a ULT  por 1 round; para cada lutador de soul Bear no seu time, esse efeito aumentado em 5%, max 30%.

weapon_awakened.name: Heroes Belt
weapon_awakened.description: Max Animal Kick (Normal mode): 30% chance to Stun Target, immutability Res Rate 30%. Max May Lee Bomb (Heroic mode): for every flag, will increase DMG by 25% and 10% Crit Rate. If the target is not Killed May Lee ATK increased by 20% (2 rounds).
weapon_awakened.description_es: Max Animal Kick (Modo Normal): 30% chance de Stun, En Inmutabilidad gana 30% de Res Rate. Max May Lee Bomb (Modo Heroico): por cada bandera incrementa el DMG en 25% y en 10% el Crit Rate. SI el objetivo no muere el ATK de May Lee se incrementa en 20% por 2 turnos.

weapon_awakened.description: Absorb target's 20% ATK, DEF, DMG rate, and Res Rate; deal massive damage to single enemy, neglecting block and resistance; 70% chance to prevent fighter killed with his skill from resurrecting and transforming (effects upon leaders reduce). When there is
weapon_awakened.description_es: Absorbe el 20% del objetivo ATK, DEF, DMG y Res Rate; inflige daño masivo a un solo enemigo, Ignorando el bloqueo y la resistencia; 70% de probabilidad de evitar que el luchador muerto con su habilidad resucite y se transforme (se reducen los efectos sobr

weapon_awakened.description:
After Awakening, attack a column, increase own <font color='#FFA726'>30%</font> DMG rate and  Res rate, reduce target column's <font color='#FFA726'>300</font> rage and reduce rage recovery speed by 90% for 1 round, adding Kyo's fire effect on target; dispel debuff on a controlled fighter on own side; if a leader or sworn enemy is on enemy side, trigger FLAME KYO effect; all kyo's fires on enemy side refresh and upgrade to demon slaying flame (burning DMG increases by 100%; when this is over or dispelled by fighter other than Flame Kyo, target's DMG rate and Res rate decreases by 20% for 2 rounds). When there is only on target and it is a leader of the King of Fighters, trigger combination skill with Instinct Iori, wich neglects block and resistance (KOFBoss: Orochi, Rugal, Goenitz ,Omega Rugal, Mukai, 
 Magaki, Ash and Adelheid).
weapon_awakened.description_es: Después del Despertar del arma, ataca una columna, aumenta su propio DMG y Res rate <font color = '# FFA726'> 30% </font> , reduce   <font color = '# FFA726'> 300 </font> Rage de la columna objetivo y reduce la velocidad de recuperación de Rage en un 90% durante 1 asalto, agregando el efecto de Kyo's fire en el objetivo; disipa el debuff en un luchador controlado en su propio lado; si un líder está del lado enemigo, activa el efecto FLAME KYO; todos los kyo's fires en el lado enemigo se actualizan a demon slaying (el DMG de la quemadura aumenta en un 100%; cuando esto termina o es disipado por un luchador que no sea Flame Kyo, el DMG rate y Res rate del objetivo disminuye en un 20% durante 2 rondas). Cuando solo hay un objetivo y es un líder King of Fighters , activa la habilidad combinada con Instinct Iori, que ignora el bloqueo y la resistencia (KOFBoss: Orochi, Rugal, Goenitz, Omega Rugal, Mukai, Magaki, Ash y Adelheid).

weapon_awakened.name: Final-Duel Ten Katar
weapon_awakened.description: Attack enemies in a column and  creating a fire shield for 2 rounds (Res Rate +10% and DMG Reflect +10%). Causes burning to the target's soul for 2 rounds (each decreasing HP by <font color='#FFA726'>12%</font> and Rage by <font color='#FFA726'>200</font>, with max limit for NPC BOSS). Will cause additional <font color='#FFA726'>35%</font> DEF reduction to TANK enemies.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Atacar una columna y crear un escudo de fuego por 2 turnos (Res Rate +10% y DMG Reflect +10%). Causa quemadura de alma (Soul Burning) a los objetivos por 2 turnos (Cada turno el enemigo pierde <font color='#FFA726'>12%</font> de HP y pierde <font color='#FFA726'>200</font> de Rage, el limite maximo para NPC Boss). Causara una reduccion adicional de <font color='#FFA726'>35%</font> de DEF a los Tankes (TANK) enemigos.

weapon_awakened.description: Attack a single enemy, ignoring block. If it kills the target, causes 70% splash DMG, decreasing 15% Res Rate; increase own 15% Crit Power, for each ally with tiger soul, Crit power will increase 5%, max 35%.

weapon_awakened.name: Infinity Gloves
weapon_awakened.description: Attack enemy with highest ATK, decreasaing target <font color='#FFA726'>20%</font> DMG, increase own <font color='#FFA726'>30%</font> Res Rate, and decreasing targeet <font color='#FFA726'>300</font> Rage; if Robert 2002 UM is deployed in your formation or aid formation, release ULT \"DoubleStarFlurry\" (Attack enemy with Highest ATK, increase own <font color='#FFA726'>30%</font> Res Rate, <font color='#FFA726'>15%</font> DMG; decreasing target <font color='#FFA726'>20%</font> DMG,<font color='#FFA726'>10%</font> Res Rate, and decreasing target <font color='#FFA726'>300</font> Rage, also dispel Robert 2002 UM debuff; skill guaranteed next round).
weapon_awakened.description_es: Ataca al enemigo con mayor ATK, disminuyendo el <font color='#FFA726'>20%</font> de DMG del objetivo, aumenta tu propia Res Rate <font color='#FFA726'>30%</font> y disminuye el Rage <font color='#FFA726'>300</font> del objetivo; si  Robert 2002 UM esta en su formación o formación de ayuda, libera ULT \"DoubleStarFlurry\" (ataca al enemigo con el ATK más alto, aumente su <font color='#FFA726'>30%</font> Res Rate, <font color='#FFA726'>15%</font> DMG; disminuye el <font color='#FFA726'>20%</font> DMG , <font color='#FFA726'>10%</font> de Res Rate y <font color='#FFA726'>300</font> Rage del objetivo, también quita debuff de Robert 2002 UM; habilidad garantizada en la siguiente ronda).

weapon_awakened.name: Tiger Necklace
weapon_awakened.description: Attack a single enemy, decreasing target 20% Res Rate, increase own 30% DMG, dealing 10% max HP DMG; if Mr. New Karate is deployed in your formation or aid formation, release ULT "Double Star Flurry" (Attack a single enemy, increase own 30% DMG, 15% Res Rate; decreasing target 20% Res Rate, 10% DMG dealing 10% max HP DMG. also dispel Mr. New Karate debuff; skill guaranteed next round)
weapon_awakened.description_es: Ataca a un solo enemigo, disminuyendo el 20% de Res del objetivo, aumenta el 30% de DMG propio, con un 10% de HP DMG máximo; si New Mr. Karate está en batalla en su formación o formación de ayuda, suelta ULT "Double Star Flurry" (Ataca a un solo enemigo, aumentando su propio 30% de DMG, 15% de Res Rate; reduce  20% Res Rate del objetivo, 10% de DMG a 10% máx HP DMG. también quita el debuff de Mr. New Karate; skill garantizada en la próxima ronda)

weapon_awakened.description: Cause a single enemy a lot of DMG with 20% chance to stun the surrounding targets and 20% Splash DMG to them. Restore own HP. If allies have 4 kinds of FightSoul, the ULT will increase allies' 30% Control and 12% Res Rate (2 rounds).

weapon_awakened.name: Awakened Death Fire
weapon_awakened.description: Strikes a column with 40% chance to silence them and a 65% chance to cause Soul Burning.
Strikes a single enemy with random debuff. Includes: 30% chance to reduce ATK, 30% chance to reduce DEF, 30% chance to be paralyzed, 30% chance to be burning. The effects can be stacked.

weapon_awakened.name: Awakened Earth
weapon_awakened.description: Strikes a column with 35% chance to stun them. Reduces own 40% DMG and increases own 60% Res Rate.

It will cause significant damage targets in a column and absorb 18% Res Rate and decrease damage dealt by 18%, if the enemy FightSoul (Tiger, Snake, Bear, Turtle) has less than 4 species, there is an additional 25% probability to stun.

The higher Omega Rugal's ATK and DEF (30%, max 40%, for 2 rounds); Omega Rugal will also use one of the newly acquired skills to deal DMG to a column of enemies (with ULT effect acquired from the triggered small skill). DMG and DEF will be increased according to overall DMG dealt.

weapon_awakened.name: Antique TV
weapon_awakened.description: Attack a column, dealing <font color='#FFA726'>30%</font> additional DMG to main target, increase own <font color='#FFA726'>20%</font>  Res Rate and ATK for 2 rounds, this round attack ignoring targets DEF <font color='#FFA726'>70%</font>, Clearing same row allies debuff (including petrification) and target column buff.
weapon_awakened.description_pt: Ataca uma coluna, causando <font color = '# FFA726'>30%</font> de DMG adicional ao alvo principal, aumenta sua própria Taxa de Res e ATK em <font color = '# FFA726'>20%</font> por 2 rodadas, neste round, ignora a DEF dos alvos em <font color = '# FFA726'> 70%</font>, eliminando Debuffs dos aliados da mesma linha (incluindo petrificação) e removendo os Buffs da coluna de atacada.

weapon_awakened.description: Attack single target, increase ally female attack power by 20%, and reduce target's 30% bloc rate. Athena 2002 UM glamour will bless all allies with "Idol Love". When fighters with "Idol Love" gets attacked, will use up Idol Love" and recover 10% HP. When fighters with "Idols Love" use ULT, will use up "Idol Love", dealing 16% additional damage and recovering 150 rage to Athena 2002 UM.
weapon_awakened.description_es: Ataca al objetivo individual, aumenta el poder de ataque de las aliadas en un 20% y reduce el Block rate 30% del objetivo. Athena 2002 UM glamour bendecirá a todos los aliados con "Idol Love". Cuando los luchadores con "Idol Love" sean atacados, usarán Idol Love "y recuperarán un 10% de HP. Cuando los luchadores con" Idols Love "usen su ULT, usarán " Idol Love ", causando un 16% de daño adicional y recuperando 150 de Rage a Atenea 2002 UM.

weapon_awakened.description: Wave champion puncher, attack single enemy, dealing DMG and splashing Vanessa marks upon nearby enemies; increase own back row's 20% crit rate and own 40% Crit rate; ULT will detonate Vanessa mark and increase DMG: 1 mark increase 15% DMG, 2 marks increase 30% DMG, and 3 marks increase 50% DMG; when dealing ULT, increase 10% HP Drain for 2 rounds. Each time a Vanessa marks, attack first the fighter with more Vanessa marks by default).
weapon_awakened.description_es: Ataca a un objetivo, repartiendo DMG y haciendo splash las marcas de Vanessa sobre los enemigos cercanos; aumenta el Crit Rate al compañero trasero en un 20% y Crit Rate 40% a ella misma; ULT detonará la marca Vanessa y aumentará la DMG: una marca aumentará un 15% de DMG, 2 marcas aumentará un 30% de DMG y 3 marcas aumentará un 50% de DMG; cuando se trata del ULT, aumente un 10% HP Drain durante 2 rondas. Cada vez que vanessa marca, ataca primero al luchador con más marcas de Vanessa por defecto).
weapon_awakened.description_pt: Ataca um único inimigo, causando DMG e dispersando marcas de Vanessa nos inimigos ao redor; aumente a taxa de Crit em 20% da própria linha traseira e 40% de sua prória taxa de Crit. O ULT detonará a marca Vanessa e aumentará a DMG: 1 marca aumenta 15% DMG, 2 marcas aumentam 30% DMG e 3 marcas aumentam 50% DMG; ao disparar o ULT, aumenta o Dreno de HP em 10% por 2 rodadas. Cada vez que Vanessa marcar um oponente, ataque primeiro o lutador com mais marcas de Vanessa por padrão.

weapon_awakened.name: Nightmare Gloves
weapon_awakened.description: Attack enemy fighter with lowest HP, absorb target's <font color='#FFA726'>25%</font> ATK and DEF and <font color='#FFA726'>300</font> rage; deal 30% extra DMG on surrounding fighters, which does not recover rage; if the main target is not killed, target enters nightmare state (DMG rate reduces by 50% upon first attack, get Crit when attacked for the first time. Lasts for 1 round)
weapon_awakened.description_es: Ataque al enemigo con el HP más bajo, absorbe el <font color = '# FFA726'> 25% </font> ATK y DEF del objetivo y <font color = '# FFA726'> 300 </font> de rage; reparte 30% de DAÑO extra en los luchadores de alrededor, los que no recuperan rage; si el objetivo principal no es asesinado, el objetivo entra en el estado de pesadilla (el DMG rate se reduce en un 50% en el primer ataque, recibe Crit cuando es atacado por primera vez. Dura 1 turno)

weapon_awakened.description: Attack the enemy with the highest HP; increase its own damage by 30% to avoid injury; increase its own offense and defense according to the target's life ratio before being hit (at least 10%, at most 25%, non-dispellable ); cause additional damage of 10% of the target's life limit; Inflict 35% of the "septic" effect (destroy the target's upper limit of life, and the amount of damage is equivalent to a certain percentage of the loss of life from this skill); dispel the negative status and petrification of one of our fighters (the controlled one is preferred) ; After death, resurrect at the next action of your side, restore 50% of the health value, and return to full rage (this effect can only be triggered once per battle); draw 40% of the target's current rage value (this effect cannot be critical and will not Blocked), if the drawn rage value is less than 100 points, an additional 200 rage will be restored

boosts 30% DMG and DEF instead of 20% remove own debuffs 180% of additional DMG to main target instead of 120% reduces target 40% DMG immunity instead of 30% boost 6.5% skill DMG instead of 5% to allies that triggered skill boosts perfect chance of allies 30% (1 round) for every objective you attack boost crit res 3% and block and crit rate 5% (stackable up to 10 times)
